### Load packages and data

```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse) 
library(dsbox) 
```

```{r load-data, message = FALSE}
states <- read_csv("data/states.csv")
```

### Exercise 1

```{r view-dennys-laquinta-data}
view(dennys)
view(laquinta)
```

```{r filter-dennys-alaska}
dn_ak <- dennys %>%
  filter(state == "AK")
nrow(dn_ak)
view(dn_ak)
```

```{r filter-laquinta-alaska}
lq_ak <- laquinta %>%
  filter(state == "AK")
nrow(lq_ak)
view(lq_ak)
```
